episodes.title: Lighthouse - A Toxic, Bullying and Predatory MLM Cult - Episode 1
episodes.description:
Lighthouse is the brainchild of Paul S Waugh. He, along with his devoted adherents have been preying on people selling self-help and scamming hundreds of thousands from people just looking to improve their lives.

When those people get upset? Paul and his team including Jai Singh employ bullying tactics and reveal private and sensitive information to destroy their lives and make them feel unsafe.

You wanted attention Paul? Now you got it. This is episode 1, just an introduction. We deep dive next.

Citations:
BBC Article - https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-65175712
Early days of FranklinWaugh - https://www.questioninglighthouseinternationalgroup.com/general-9-1
The BBC Documentary 'A Very British Cult'.
